amendment.description: An amendment numbered 52 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to expedite the completion of a disposition study and requires the Secretary to report on the feasibility of preserving and uenhancing recreational opportunities and the health of the ecosystem of Upper St. Anthony Falls Lock and Dam.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Paulsen.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
